title: North Carolina: The under the radar Senate race everyone should be watching
description: Former North Carolina Gov. Pat McCrory talks about why the Senate race between Republican Congressman Ted Budd and former State Supreme Court Chief Justice, Democrat Cheri Beasley, is one of those under-the-radar races that could end up being as decisive as any other state on our watch lists.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
